         Ã‚Â¦  Ableton  is  proud  to  release Live 6. Like no other  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Ableton  release,  Live  6  has  opened itself to new  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  creative    communities+offering    Quicktime   video  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  support,  a  professional  multisample  library,  and  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  customizable racks of instruments and effects. Live 6  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  also  satisfies  frequent user requests by delivering  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  multicore support, enhanced project management tools,  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  and improved MIDI control.                             Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  "Live  6 upholds Ableton&#039;s tradition of responding to  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  and  respecting our vocal user base while maintaining  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  our vision for the program," says Ableton CEO and co-  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  founder Gerhard Behles. "The results are               Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  exciting+Live  6  is  our most versatile and powerful  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  version   to   date.   We   also   spent  significant  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  development  resources  on  workflow  improvements to  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  make   sure  Live  continues  to  feel  good  as  the  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  functionality grows."                                  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  With  Quicktime  video support, Live enters the world  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  of  post-production.  Drag  and  drop movies directly  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  into  Live&#039;s Arrangement View, and monitor the result  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  on a video window or second screen. Then, align music  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  to  visuals,  and  process  the  movie&#039;s audio signal  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  within  Live.  It has never been easier to improvise,  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  compose and warp music to picture.                     Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  The  Essential  Instrument Collection provides Live 6  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  users  with  a  comprehensive library of multisampled  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  instruments.   The  included  instruments  cover  the  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  entire  musical spectrum, from orchestral strings and  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  brasses,  to  classic guitars and electric keyboards,  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  to  instruments  like  the harp and the glockenspiel.  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Load and play the collection in Live&#039;s Simpler, or in  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Sampler+Ableton&#039;s     new    optional    multi-sample  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  instrument.                                            Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Instrument  and  Effect  Racks  offer  a new level of  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  depth  to Live without sacrificing accessibility. Use  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Racks   to   create,  save,  and  control  customized  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  groupings  of multiple instruments, effects and plug-  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  ins.  Then  distribute your creations online. Use the  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Rack&#039;s   included  knobs  to  adjust  any  number  of  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  parameters  with a single knob or fader. Live 6 comes  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  with  many  preconfigured racks with both instruments  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  and  common  processing  tools  like  guitar and bass  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  distortion,    drum    processing,   and   mastering.  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Live 6 also features a number of exciting changes and  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  improvements:                                          Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Multicore   and   Multiprocessor  support  allow  the  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  computational  workload  from instruments and effects  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  to  be  distributed  to  other  processors  or cores,  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  speeding up system performance.                        Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Deep Freeze expands editing functionality with frozen  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  tracks  (temporary  rendered  files  created  to free  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  system  resources).  Cut,  copy, paste, duplicate and  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  consolidate   clips   without  having  to  re-freeze.  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Automate  mixer  and  clip  envelopes,  record frozen  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  session  view  clips  into  the arrangement, and drag  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  frozen  MIDI  clips  into  audio  tracks, all without  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  missing a beat.                                        Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  New  and  Improved  Devices  add to Live&#039;s palette of  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  creative tools.                                        Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  EQ  Eight  has  replaced  EQ  Four, with improvements  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  turning  it  into  both a sound-shaping and mastering  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  tool.                                                  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Add  analog  richness  with  the  warm  distortion of  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Dynamic  Tube. Like many of Live&#039;s effects, it can be  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  used   for   subtle   coloration   or  drastic  sonic  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  manipulation.                                          Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Saturator  has  been  improved with the addition of a  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  true   analog   saturation  curve,  a  user-definable  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  waveshaper,  and  an optional second output saturator  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  stage.                                                 Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Automate  and  "play"  incoming  MIDI notes with Note  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Length.  This MIDI effect can generate new notes when  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  incoming  notes  are  released, emulating the release  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  behavior   of  instruments  like  the  piano  or  the  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  harpsichord.                                           Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Operator has been augmented with a set of 24dB filter  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  modes,  as  well  as  new FM algorithms, giving users  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  more sonic possibilities than ever.                    Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦                                                         Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Conveniently  organize collections of Live Sets, Live  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  Clips,  presets,  samples,  and movie files with Live  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  6&#039;s  new  Project  Management  Tools.  Self-contain a  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  project  and  pack  it  with lossless compression for  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  archiving  or  transfer using Project Folders. Search  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  for  missing files and purge the disk of unused files  Ã‚Â¦
         Ã‚Â¦  with ease.                                             Ã‚Â¦
